name: HoneySelect2Libido DX
description:
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
■Raise your arms and cheer, for the future of libido is here!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
We here at Illusion are passionate about sex. Like, REALLY passionate. All of that energy, that vim and vigor? We've poured it all into creating the ultimate sex simulator! Behold, our masterpiece! Honey Select 2: Libido Deluxe!

Sex. It's a many-faceted beast, one that takes great determination and a craftsman's touch to be truly satisfying. We get it. We do! That's why we've dedicated our hearts and souls to perfecting every aspect of The Act. Animations, characters, facial expressions? Check. New technology, hot innovations? Check check! And...what was that? Even, yes—gasp!—conversation!

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.


━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
■Sensual Sensations Galore!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Honey Select 2: Libido Deluxe is one-of-a-kind. Nowhere else will you find character models this detailed, this customizable, this lewd. Better yet, we've got a huge variety of sexy situations you can experience with your chosen partner, from romantic evenings to tentacles for two. Whatever you want, we've got—and pants are optional!




━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
■Tons of Character Personalities and Customization!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Step right up, digital storefront perusers, and browse our wide selection of character personalities! You there! Want your partner to be a lusty businesswoman, clad in skin-tight business attire? We got it! And you there, feel the need for the happy-go-lucky sporty type? Why, we got that, too! Whether you're looking for an outgoing tomboy or a meek bookworm, a doting caregiver or a leather-clad dominatrix, we've got you covered! And of course, each personality comes with their own unique expressions, dialogue, and quirks.

But the customization doesn't stop with just what's inside! We've also got a dazzling selection of outfits, hairstyles, accessories, and other personalization options as well. With just a snap of your fingers, you can summon the sexual partner of your dreams! Go forth and be creative—the sky's the limit!




━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
■A Multitude of Sexy Situations!
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
We all know atmosphere is important for a truly good sexual experience. Everyone has their own tastes, which is why Honey Select 2 has something for everyone. Flowers, candlelight, maybe a bit of slow jazz? Oooo yeah, we got the romance. Or do you prefer something a little...darker? Listen, I'm not judging, but I will leave the key to the sex dungeon on the table. The safe word's "banana." Or, hmm...maybe you're into roleplay? Hey, we've all got fantasies. The wardrobe's thataway. Leave the elf ears on the table on the way out.

But what about those of you with an artistic eye and the urge to unleash your creative beast? Don't worry, we've got you covered with full camera customization! Choose a map and your favorite sex position, set the lighting with a plethora of controls, then go ham and sausage with a free-form camera. Honey Select 2's here to let you achieve that perfect shot.
And for those of you who don't care about all that, don't sweat it! We've got a mind-boggling amount of satisfying default options to pick and choose from. Simple and intuitive controls let you easily swing around for the money shot without delving into the more complex control menus. We're as easy or as hard as you want us to be!




━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
■Story
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Intuition. That's what brought you down this seldom-traveled street to this massive, nondescript building. A sense that somehow, this was your fate—and a decision you'd never, ever regret. As you pushed open the gilded doors, you were startled to see someone standing just inside to greet you, as if she had been expecting you all along. This stunning woman with the mysterious twinkle in her eyes introduced herself as Fur, your humble guide to this humble establishment.

Welcome to Honey Select.
A private establishment serving only the most discerning customers. A place where anyone can find anyone, and dreams can become reality. The patrons here all have one thing in common: they're looking for a partner, and that partner can be you.

There are all types here. Some are here to find a lifelong partner, someone to care for, to share joys and sorrows. Some, well, they're looking to tap into their primal, carnal natures, and forget everything in the heat of passion. Some are tricksters, their joy found from wrapping people around their fingers and maybe—just maybe—giving them what they want.
Anything is permitted here. Anything is possible.
Because this? This is a palace of libido, and you're its newest customer.
